verbs.description: Trump [V: wo] n’t allow the Philadelphia Eagles to the White House because of the dispute over whether NFL players must stand during the national anthem .

[ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: wo] [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [V: allow] [ARG1: the Philadelphia Eagles to the White House] [ARGM-CAU: because of the dispute over whether NFL players must stand during the national anthem] .
Trump wo n’t allow the Philadelphia Eagles to the White House because of the dispute over whether NFL players [V: must] stand during the national anthem .
Trump wo n’t allow the Philadelphia Eagles to the White House because of the dispute over whether [ARG1: NFL players] [ARGM-MOD: must] [V: stand] [ARG2: during the national anthem] .
